attributes.action: Complete the dualling of the A417(T) 'Missing Link' between Nettleton and Brockworth, Gloucestershire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyday hundreds of road users are delayed at the only section of single carriageway between the M4 and M5. This section was intended to be built in the mid 1990's and remains bogged down in Gov't bureaucratic administration. It is time for a decision to be made on the route and the intended dual-carriageway completed.
